item.description:
It is my pleasure to announce that we'll be having the Art of Living course in New Haven. In addition to being a powerful stress busters I find these courses to be a lot of fun and good for the soul. Please come and join us. The course is spread through 5 days. A person planning to attend is asked to make commitment to come to all sessions. Following is a more detailed course announcement. http://www.aolmi.org/...

Please be aware there is a fee for the course. Registration and payment should be made at the following site:
http://secure.artofli...

The following link gives a bit more information about the course.
Art Of Living - MSNBC Coverage- http://www.youtube.co...
item.name: Art of Living course
